column1: Little Goat Diner////Been here twice now! Love it. The menu is super fun and interesting
column2: and if there's any flaw with it
column3: it's that there's too much good stuff on it! You don't know what to choose and you worry that you'll end up enviously eyeballing whatever your friend got. Well don't worry
column4: because I don't think you can really go wrong here.
